Package com.pb.sawdust.io

Provides classes relating to input/output.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IterableReader<D>
    The IterableReader interface is used to specify a reader which can iterate over a series of data.
    RuntimeCloseable
    The RuntimeCloseable interface is essentially a replica of the java.io.Closeable interface, with the checked exceptions removed.
    ZipFile.ZipEntrySource
    The ZipEntrySource provides a framework for sending data into a zip file entry.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ByteOrderDataInputStream
    The ByteBufferInputStream is a data input stream which allows the endianness of the input to be specified.
    ByteOrderDataOutputStream
    The ByteOrderDataOutputStream is a data output stream which allows the endianness of the output to be specified.
    DelimitedDataReader
    The DelimitedDataReader is used to read delimited data from a file.
    FileUtil
    The FileUtil class provides static convenience methods for dealing with files and directories.
    FlushingOutputStream
    The FlushingOutputStream ...
    IterableFileReader
    The IterableFileReader class offers static convenience methods for dealing with reading files.
    IterableFileReader.LineIterableReader
    The LineIterableReader is an iterable reader which is used to iterate over the lines in a file.
    LineEntryInputStream
    The LineEntryInputStream is a convenience class for constructing an input stream on a series of text "lines." The constructor takes a list of lines (without a line-separator) and will build input stream with the appropriate line-separator ending each line.
    LineSeparatorPrintWriter
    The LineSeparatorPrintWriter provides a PrintWriter whose line separator can be set.
    ReaderInputStream
    The ReaderInputStream ...
    StreamConnector
    The StreamConnector class provides static convenience methods for connecting InputStreams to OutputStreams.
    TextFile
    The TextFile is a convenience class for reading and writing text files.
    ZipFile
    The ZipFile class provides a convenience class for dealing with zip files.
    ZipFile.CompositeZipEntrySource
    The CompositeZipEntrySource provides a zip entry source made from a series of ZipEntrySources.
    ZipFile.FileZipEntrySource
    The FileZipEntrySource provides a simple zip entry source which reads its data from a file.

Package com.pb.sawdust.io Description

Provides classes relating to input/output. It includes utility classes for dealing with files, as well as classes used to transfer checked IOExceptions to RuntimeExceptions.
